column3: wendy rene after laughter comes tears after laughter comes tears   another night another party sayin' hi to everybody im sorry it's time to leave i gotta leave now got somewhere i gotta be now i'm starving can somebody walk me to my car if i go alone im not gon' make it very far i'm happy for the love and all of the above if i'm being honest i done been through way too much  pre i can't fake another smile i can't fake like i'm alright woo ah woo ah and i won't say im feeling fine after what i been through i cant lie woo ah woo ah   fuck a fake smile smile fuck a fake smile fake smile   i read the things they write about me hear what they're sayin on the tv it's crazy it's gettin' hard for them to shock me but every now and then its shocking don't blame me i know it's the life that i chose but baby i'm grateful i want you to know i'm happy for the love and all of the above if i'm being honest i done been through way too much  pre i can't fake another smile i can't fake like i'm alright woo ah woo ah and i won't say i'm feeling fine after what i been through i can't lie woo ah woo ah   fuck a fake smile smile fuck a fake smile fake smile   if i'm hurt i ain't gon' lie about it arms crossed with the attitude lips pouted if i'm mad i ain't gon' lie about it neck roll with the attitude yuh if i'm hurt i ain't gon' lie about it arms crossed with the attitude lips pouted if i'm mad i ain't gon' lie about it neck roll with the attitude yuh  pre i can't fake another smile and i can't fake i can't fake like i'm alright another smile woo ah woo ah ooh and i won't say i'm feeling fine i'm feeling fine after what i been through i can't lie woo ah woo ah   fuck a fake smile smile fuck a fake smile fake smile yeah
